blogPost.excerpt: Restore and repair pictures with AI. Hotpot builds on the latest research to automatically remove scratches, sharpen colors, and enhance faces, transforming damaged photos into cherished memories. Repair both color photos and black & white images for free.
blogPost.body: Restore and repair pictures with AI. Hotpot builds on the latest research to automatically remove scratches, sharpen colors, and enhance faces, transforming damaged photos into cherished memories. Repair both color photos and black & white images for free.
blogPost.title: AI Picture Restoration - Free way to remove scratches, sharpen colors, and fix photos
blogPost.author: Clarence Hu

localize.description: 用AI还原和修复图片。火锅基于最新的研究，自动去除划痕、锐化色彩、增强面部，将受损的照片变成珍贵的回忆。免费修复彩色照片和黑白图像。
localize.tagline: 免费去除划痕、锐化色彩、修复照片的方法。

localize.description: 用AI還原和修復圖片。火鍋基於最新的研究，自動去除劃痕、銳化色彩、增強面部，將受損的照片變成珍貴的回憶。免費修復彩色照片和黑白圖像。
localize.tagline: 免費去除劃痕、銳化色彩、修復照片的方法。

previous.excerpt: Branch is your space for work and play! ⠀ Bring back serendipity, spontaneous conversations, hallway bump-ins, watercooler chats and so much more that's missing in remote work with the collaborative and fun virtual HQ.
previous.title: Branch 2.0 - Your space for work and play

localize.description: Branch 是您工作和娱乐的空间 ⠀ 通过协作和有趣的虚拟总部，让远程工作中缺少的偶然性、自发的对话、走廊上的碰撞、水杯聊天等重新回归。
Branch 是您工作和娛樂的空間 ⠀ 通過協作和有趣的虛擬總部，讓遠程工作中缺少的偶然性、自發的對話、走廊上的碰撞、水杯聊天等重新迴歸。
